item.title: Nancy add a quote by Trans-Siberian Orchestra
item.description: "Music always reminded him of the voice of God, for it needed no translation and could reach and renew the soul like very few other things could." -- Trans-Siberian Orchestra

item.title: Nancy add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Each person who ever was or is or will be has a song. It isn't a song that anybody else wrote. It has its own melody, it has its own words. Very few people get to sing their song. Most of us fear that we cannot do it justice with our voices, or that our words are too foolish or too honest, or too odd. So people live their song instead." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Nancy add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Fairy tales are more than true: not because they tell us that dragons exist, but because they tell us that dragons can be beaten." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Nancy add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I refuse to answer that question on the grounds that I don't know the answer" -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Nancy add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "It is known that there are an infinite number of worlds, simply because there is an infinite amount of space for them to be in. However, not every one of them is inhabited. Therefore, there must be a finite number of inhabited worlds. Any finite number divided by infinity is as near to nothing as makes no odds, so the average population of all the planets in the Universe can be said to be zero. From this it follows that the population of the whole Universe is also zero, and that any people you may meet from time to time are merely the products of a deranged imagination." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Nancy add a quote by e.e. cummings
item.description: "I thank you God for this most amazing day, for the leaping greenly spirits of trees, and for the blue dream of sky and for everything which is natural, which is infinite, which is yes." -- e.e. cummings

item.title: Nancy add a quote by E.E. Cummings
item.description: "life's not a paragraph And death i think is no parenthesis" -- E.E. Cummings

item.title: Nancy add a quote by John August
item.description: "A little nonsense now and then, Is cherished by the wisest men." -- John August

item.title: Nancy add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description:
"Never put off till tomorrow what may be done day after tomorrow just as well".
From: "More Maxims of Mark" -- Mark Twain

item.title: Nancy add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "My professional aspirations were simple - I wanted to be an intergalactic princess." -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Nancy add a quote by Linda Grayson
item.description: "There is nothing better than a friend, unless it is a friend with chocolate." -- Linda Grayson

item.title: Nancy add a quote by Joss Whedon
item.description: "Remember to always be yourself. Unless you suck." -- Joss Whedon

item.title: Nancy add a quote by Joss Whedon
item.description: "Two roads diverged in a wood, and I took the road less traveled by and they CANCELLED MY FRIKKIN' SHOW. I totally shoulda took the road that had all those people on it. Damn." -- Joss Whedon
